      • checkLocation

        public static boolean checkLocation(java.nio.file.Path sourceLocation,
                    LanguageType languageType)
        Checks in a specified directory whether files of the specified language type are occuring.
        Parameters:
        sourceLocation - the directory which will be searched in
        languageType - the language type that is being looked for
        Returns:
        true, if there is a file, false if there is none
